children.name: Master of the Will: Mind Control

advantages.name: 4 - A total of -30 Points from the following Disadvantages:

children.name: Charitable
children.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge

features.situation: to IQ-based skills when alone, or only -1 if in a group of 4 or less

children.name: Judo
children.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

notes.text: 500 points - Your domain is the human mind. You can influence or even control other people’s mental processes. You have enough combat skill to survive an actual fight, but your normal approach is to prevent them from starting. You may have other useful mental abilities as well. The power source for this template is often Psionic, but Magic is also appropriate.
